definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: Most of that energy is released when the plant dies and decays.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的能量会在其死去腐烂后逸散出去。

sentences.english: Measuring the amount of natural gas that is leaking during drilling is one challenge.
sentences.chinese: 测算油气井开采过程中逸散的天然气量是一个难题。

definition: to dissipate everywhere (of light, sound, gas etc)
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
variant of 彌漫|弥漫[mi2 man4]
(of a vapor etc) to rise/to hang in the air
to leak out/to release (liquid or gas)
to pour into/perfusion (med.)/to concentrate one's attention on/to teach/to inculcate/to instill
